title: Sherwin-Williams
description: Sherwin-Williams is a well-known brand in the paint and coatings industry, renowned for its extensive palette selection. The brand's colors, including '666666' - a neutral grey, '0069AF' - a bold blue, and '336699' - a deep blue, are celebrated for their versatility and timeless appeal. These colors are well-documented in the Sherwin-Williams style guide, which serves as the primary source for their color specifications.
